job.title: Jr. Software Engineer

years shipping production software on the web ltligtltligt you have experience with relational data sql and rdbms like postgres postgres experience is not required however ltligtltligt you are not afraid to work on both the front and backend though this role focuses primarily on the backend ltligtltligt you have experience in healthcare technology though by no means is this required we can teach you healthcare ltligtltligt you have experience with python and django though experience with similar languages and frameworks is valuable as well ltligtltulgt ltstronggt wfh ltstronggtltstronggt the engineering team works asynchronously relying on written communications in github slack and jira our team is distributed applicants must live and be authorized to work in the united states ltstronggtltstronggt compensation ltstronggtltstronggt compensation for this role is commensurate with experience ltstronggtltstronggt about stratasan ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhen you think healthcare data and analytics company whats the first thought that comes to mind that sounds like a super fun place to work us too though maybe were biasedltbrgtltbrgtour bright diverse team of analysts engineers product developers and everyday dreamers are working to shake up the healthcare space and change the way hospitals use data and analytics serving as a hub for business development intelligence we provide our clients with a foundation for growth in the areas of hospital planning marketing physician relations and expansionltbrgtltbrgtwere stronger because of customerfirst culture and our inclusive work environment were a team of entrepreneuriallyminded selfmotivated healthcare aficionados and technology geeks together we solve complex problems rethink conventional processes and celebrate big winsltbrgtltbrgtwere an equal opportunity employer all applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin veteran or disability status we believe our differences truly make us strongerltbrgtltbrgtinterested in joining a team of experts were looking for passionate individuals interested in at the last minute or make the morning coffee everybody does whats necessary to keep the engine running we dont believe in pulling rankltbrgtltbrgtour success is my successltbrgtltbrgtwe support one another strive for the success of our team and recognize that nothing is done aloneltbrgtltbrgtwell figure it outltbrgtltbrgtwe may not immediately have the answer to a question but were always committed to finding one we believe most challenges are great opportunities to consciously show up and with a resourceful attitude brainstorm and consider the best course of action whatever comes our way we wont quit until we find a solutionltbrgtltbrgthonest conversations make us strongerltbrgtltbrgtwe approach conversations from a position of vulnerability we assume others have positive intentions and strive to see their perspective before sharing our own this combination allows us to create stronger more collaborative relationshipswhich ultimately is how we growltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt assume positive intent ltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe believe its important to start from the assumption that people are good and that the intent behind their actions are positive
